creator: js@nw3.dk
text:
If there is a pagebreak in a cell spanning multiple rows. Border are drawn
before the pagebreak and then some, but not after.

The same behaviour is also present using awt, so the bug is properly shows up
when creating the area tree.

Created attachment 3823
Demo of table cell bug
creator: js@nw3.dk
vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
The borders are conditional, so it's normal if they don't show up at the bottom
of all the pages but the last one.
The strange behaviour that can be observed with FOP 0.94 appears to be fixed in
the Trunk, so I think this bug can be closed.
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
